summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 CROSSROADS CRUISER.  THE VEHICLE HAS POWER KING TOWMAX TIRES, SIZE 225ST/75/R15 (NA).  WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 50 MPH, THE REAR DRIVER'S SIDE TIRE BLEW OUT.  THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO A REPAIR SHOP AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE SIDEWALL WAS DEFECTIVE BECAUSE IT COMPLETELY BLEW OUT OF THE TIRE.  THE TIRES WERE REPLACED.  THE CONTACT STILL HAS POSSESSION OF THE FAILED TIRES.  THE MANUFACTURER OF THE VEHICLE AND TIRES WAS UNABLE TO ASSIST.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 5,000.    UPDATED 09/23/08  *BF  UPDATED 09/25/08. *JB
